channel.title: French sounds of Half Life 1 for French users of Black mesa please?
channel.description:
hello
can anybody make a kind of patch to use the French sounds from half life 1 into black mesa please ?
this will be a pleasure for French community :3
at this time i can see only a French patch for subtitles, it's really boring, i was exited to play Black mesa but without French sounds it's too much frustrated :meh:
